column5: Apartment in the top floor of a house built in 1928 and restored in 2015. Ten-foot ceilings, upgraded flooring and fixtures, quiet space for you to rest and recharge whether you're in Dallas for business or pleasure. Downtown Dallas is 10 minutes away -- and you're just 20 minutes from Six Flags, Cowboys Stadium, Globe Life Park and Hurricane Harbor, and just 30 minutes from downtown Fort Worth.
column8: Private, quiet bedroom suite in Bishop Arts
